other_tests.procedure_name: Methylation analysis of exon A/B DMR
other_tests.findings: Patient 1: normal methylation at 57%; Patient 2: reduced methylation at 34%.
Identified a 6.4-Kb deletion in Patient 1 and a 1,438-bp deletion in Patient 2.
Patient 2 showed a reduced average methylation level (32%) at CpGs within exon A/B of GNAS compared to normal subjects.
